tool_description:
connects to "Streak CRM"
Streak offers a simple CRM extension to use with Gmail. 
You install it in the Chrome browser, then create a set of workflow interfaces in Gmail that allow you to organize related sets of emails. 
* Send reminders to yourself in Gmail, 
* Queue mails to be sent at certain dates
* create worklows

Some recent email extensions, like Rapportive, also provide lightweight CRM features, but Streak goes way deeper into the workflow process.
name: Streak CRM for GMAIL
title: Streak CRM for GMAIL

api_list.name: User

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The email address of the user

optional_parameters.name: lowercaseEmail
optional_parameters.description: A lower case version of the users email address. Useful for normalization

optional_parameters.name: lastSeenTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: The date the user last logged ino Streak

optional_parameters.name: isOauthComplete
optional_parameters.description: Whether the user has completed the OAuth process. Useful to determine whether they can successully share emails

optional_parameters.name: displayName
optional_parameters.description: A display friendly name, usually the users full name if it exists in their profile

api_list.name: Pipeline
api_list.description: Pipelines represent a business process that a user would like managed.

optional_parameters.name: creatorKey
optional_parameters.description: The user key of the user that created the pipeline

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: the purpose of this pipeline, displayed in the web UI.

optional_parameters.name: orgWide
optional_parameters.description: Whether this pipeline is shared with all users in the organization (same domain in email address)

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: what fields each box within the pipeline can have. This field is read-only. To modify, refer to the Fields endpoints

optional_parameters.name: stages
optional_parameters.description: A map describing the set of possible stages a box within the pipeline can be in. Read-only and can only be modified using Stages endpoints

optional_parameters.name: stageOrder
optional_parameters.description: Editable array which allows you to reorder the stages. This modifies the order of the stages that appear in the web UI

optional_parameters.name: aclEntries
optional_parameters.description: An array of ACL objects (with properties: fullName, email, isOwner, image) which determines a list of users who have access to this pipeline

optional_parameters.name: owner
optional_parameters.description: An object with the same properties as elements in the aclEntries array specifying the creator of this pipeline
